movies.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
movies.overview: A young boy wins a tour through the most magnificent chocolate factory in the world, led by the world's most unusual candy maker.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#f59e0b' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Charlie and the Chocolate Fact...</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Ratatouille
movies.overview: A rat named Remy dreams of becoming a great French chef despite his family's wishes and the obvious problem of being a rat in a decidedly rodent-phobic profession. When fate places Remy in the sewers of Paris, he finds himself ideally situated beneath a restaurant made famous by his culinary hero, Auguste Gusteau. Despite the apparent dangers of being an unlikely - and certainly unwanted - visitor in the kitchen of a fine French restaurant, Remy's passion for cooking soon sets into motion a hilarious and exciting rat race that turns the culinary world of Paris upside down.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#f59e0b' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Ratatouille</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Batman Begins
movies.overview: Driven by tragedy, billionaire Bruce Wayne dedicates his life to uncovering and defeating the corruption that plagues his home, Gotham City.  Unable to work within the system, he instead creates a new identity, a symbol of fear for the criminal underworld - The Batman.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#f59e0b' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Batman Begins</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
movies.overview: Alex, Marty, Melman, Gloria, King Julien, Maurice, the penguins and the chimps are back and still marooned on Madagascar. In the face of this obstacle, the New Yorkers have hatched a plan so crazy it just might work. With military precision, the penguins have repaired an old crashed plane... sort of.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#7c3aed' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
movies.overview: Hapless museum night watchman Larry Daley must help his living, breathing exhibit friends out of a pickle now that they've been transferred to the archives at the Smithsonian Institution. Larry's (mis)adventures this time include close encounters with Amelia Earhart, Abe Lincoln and Ivan the Terrible.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#06b6d4' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Night at the Museum: Battle of...</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: X-Men Origins: Wolverine
movies.overview: After seeking to live a normal life, Logan sets out to avenge the death of his girlfriend by undergoing the mutant Weapon X program and becoming Wolverine.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#7c3aed' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>X-Men Origins: Wolverine</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: The Matrix Revolutions
movies.overview: The human city of Zion defends itself against the massive invasion of the machines as Neo fights to end the war at another front while also opposing the rogue Agent Smith.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#06b6d4' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>The Matrix Revolutions</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Frozen
movies.overview: Young princess Anna of Arendelle dreams about finding true love at her sister Elsa’s coronation. Fate takes her on a dangerous journey in an attempt to end the eternal winter that has fallen over the kingdom. She's accompanied by ice delivery man Kristoff, his reindeer Sven, and snowman Olaf. On an adventure where she will find out what friendship, courage, family, and true love really means.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#f59e0b' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Frozen</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: The Matrix Reloaded
movies.overview: Six months after the events depicted in The Matrix, Neo has proved to be a good omen for the free humans, as more and more humans are being freed from the matrix and brought to Zion, the one and only stronghold of the Resistance.  Neo himself has discovered his superpowers including super speed, ability to see the codes of the things inside the matrix and a certain degree of pre-cognition. But a nasty piece of news hits the human resistance: 250,000 machine sentinels are digging to Zion and would reach them in 72 hours. As Zion prepares for the ultimate war, Neo, Morpheus and Trinity are advised by the Oracle to find the Keymaker who would help them reach the Source.  Meanwhile Neo's recurrent dreams depicting Trinity's death have got him worried and as if it was not enough, Agent Smith has somehow escaped deletion, has become more powerful than before and has fixed Neo as his next target.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#6366f1' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>The Matrix Reloaded</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Thor: The Dark World
movies.overview: Thor fights to restore order across the cosmos… but an ancient race led by the vengeful Malekith returns to plunge the universe back into darkness. Faced with an enemy that even Odin and Asgard cannot withstand, Thor must embark on his most perilous and personal journey yet, one that will reunite him with Jane Foster and force him to sacrifice everything to save us all.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#ef4444' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Thor: The Dark World</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
movies.overview: An apocalyptic story set in the furthest reaches of our planet, in a stark desert landscape where humanity is broken, and most everyone is crazed fighting for the necessities of life. Within this world exist two rebels on the run who just might be able to restore order. There's Max, a man of action and a man of few words, who seeks peace of mind following the loss of his wife and child in the aftermath of the chaos. And Furiosa, a woman of action and a woman who believes her path to survival may be achieved if she can make it across the desert back to her childhood homeland.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#ef4444' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Mad Max: Fury Road</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Angels & Demons
movies.overview: Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon investigates a mysterious symbol seared into the chest of a murdered physicist. He discovers evidence of the unimaginable, the rebirth of an ancient secret brotherhood known as the Illuminati, the most powerful underground organization ever to walk the earth.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#06b6d4' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Angels & Demons</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Thor
movies.overview: Against his father Odin's will, The Mighty Thor - a powerful but arrogant warrior god - recklessly reignites an ancient war. Thor is cast down to Earth and forced to live among humans as punishment. Once here, Thor learns what it takes to be a true hero when the most dangerous villain of his world sends the darkest forces of Asgard to invade Earth.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#f59e0b' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Thor</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Bolt
movies.overview: Bolt is the star of the biggest show in Hollywood. The only problem is, he thinks it's real. After he's accidentally shipped to New York City and separated from Penny, his beloved co-star and owner, Bolt must harness all his "super powers" to find a way home.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#f59e0b' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Bolt</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: G-Force
movies.overview: A team of trained secret agent animals, guinea pigs Darwin, Juarez, Blaster, mole Speckles, and fly Mooch takes on a mission for the US government to stop evil Leonard Saber, who plans to destroy the world with household appliances. But the government shuts them down and they are sentenced to a pet shop. Can they escape to defeat the villain and save the world?
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#7c3aed' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>G-Force</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Wrath of the Titans
movies.overview: A decade after his heroic defeat of the monstrous Kraken, Perseus-the demigod son of Zeus-is attempting to live a quieter life as a village fisherman and the sole parent to his 10-year old son, Helius. Meanwhile, a struggle for supremacy rages between the gods and the Titans. Dangerously weakened by humanity's lack of devotion, the gods are losing control of the imprisoned Titans and their ferocious leader, Kronos, father of the long-ruling brothers Zeus, Hades and Poseidon.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#10b981' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Wrath of the Titans</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Dark Shadows
movies.overview: Vampire Barnabas Collins is inadvertently freed from his tomb and emerges into the very changed world of 1972. He returns to Collinwood Manor to find that his once-grand estate and family have fallen into ruin.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#f59e0b' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Dark Shadows</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation
movies.overview: Ethan and team take on their most impossible mission yet, eradicating the Syndicate - an International rogue organization as highly skilled as they are, committed to destroying the IMF.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#10b981' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Mission: Impossible - Rogue Na...</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: The Wolfman
movies.overview: Lawrence Talbot, an American man on a visit to Victorian London to make amends with his estranged father, gets bitten by a werewolf and, after a moonlight transformation, leaves him with a savage hunger for flesh.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#ef4444' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>The Wolfman</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Bee Movie
movies.overview: Barry B. Benson, a bee who has just graduated from college, is disillusioned at his lone career choice: making honey. On a special trip outside the hive, Barry's life is saved by Vanessa, a florist in New York City. As their relationship blossoms, he discovers humans actually eat honey, and subsequently decides to sue us.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#ec4899' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Bee Movie</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Kung Fu Panda 2
movies.overview: Po is now living his dream as The Dragon Warrior, protecting the Valley of Peace alongside his friends and fellow kung fu masters, The Furious Five - Tigress, Crane, Mantis, Viper and Monkey. But Po’s new life of awesomeness is threatened by the emergence of a formidable villain, who plans to use a secret, unstoppable weapon to conquer China and destroy kung fu. It is up to Po and The Furious Five to journey across China to face this threat and vanquish it. But how can Po stop a weapon that can stop kung fu? He must look to his past and uncover the secrets of his mysterious origins; only then will he be able to unlock the strength he needs to succeed.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#f59e0b' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Kung Fu Panda 2</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: The Last Airbender
movies.overview: The story follows the adventures of Aang, a young successor to a long line of Avatars, who must put his childhood ways aside and stop the Fire Nation from enslaving the Water, Earth and Air nations.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#10b981' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>The Last Airbender</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Mission: Impossible III
movies.overview: Retired from active duty to train new IMF agents, Ethan Hunt is called back into action to confront sadistic arms dealer, Owen Davian. Hunt must try to protect his girlfriend while working with his new team to complete the mission.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#06b6d4' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Mission: Impossible III</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: White House Down
movies.overview: Capitol Policeman John Cale has just been denied his dream job with the Secret Service of protecting President James Sawyer. Not wanting to let down his little girl with the news, he takes her on a tour of the White House, when the complex is overtaken by a heavily armed paramilitary group. Now, with the nation's government falling into chaos and time running out, it's up to Cale to save the president, his daughter, and the country.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#6366f1' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>White House Down</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Mars Needs Moms
movies.overview: When Martians suddenly abduct his mom, mischievous Milo rushes to the rescue and discovers why all moms are so special.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#6366f1' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Mars Needs Moms</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Flushed Away
movies.overview: London high-society mouse, Roddy is flushed down the toilet by Sid, a common sewer rat. Hang on for a madcap adventure deep in the sewer bowels of Ratropolis, where Roddy meets the resourceful Rita, the rodent-hating Toad and his faithful thugs, Spike and Whitey.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#7c3aed' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Flushed Away</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Pan
movies.overview: Living a bleak existence at a London orphanage, 12-year-old Peter finds himself whisked away to the fantastical world of Neverland. Adventure awaits as he meets new friend James Hook and the warrior Tiger Lily. They must band together to save Neverland from the ruthless pirate Blackbeard. Along the way, the rebellious and mischievous boy discovers his true destiny, becoming the hero forever known as Peter Pan.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#06b6d4' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Pan</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Mr. Peabody & Sherman
movies.overview: A young boy and his dog, who happens to have a genius-level IQ, spring into action when their time-travel machine is stolen and moments in history begin to be changed.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#f59e0b' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Mr. Peabody & Sherman</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Troy
movies.overview: In year 1250 B.C. during the late Bronze age, two emerging nations begin to clash. Paris, the Trojan prince, convinces Helen, Queen of Sparta, to leave her husband Menelaus, and sail with him back to Troy. After Menelaus finds out that his wife was taken by the Trojans, he asks his brother Agamemnom to help him get her back. Agamemnon sees this as an opportunity for power. So they set off with 1,000 ships holding 50,000 Greeks to Troy. With the help of Achilles, the Greeks are able to fight the never before defeated Trojans.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#ec4899' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Troy</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted
movies.overview: Alex, Marty, Gloria and Melman are still trying to get back to the Big Apple and their beloved Central Park zoo, but first they need to find the penguins. When they travel to Monte Carlo, they attract the attention of Animal Control after gate crashing a party and are joined by the penguins, King Julian and Co., and the monkeys. How do a lion, zebra, hippo, giraffe, four penguins, two monkeys, three lemurs travel through Europe without attracting attention and get back to New York? They join a traveling circus. Their attempts to get back to New York are consistently hampered by the Captain of Animal Control who wants to make Alex part of her collection. Once they make it back to New York Marty, Alex, Gloria and Melman realize that they want to be part of the traveling circus.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#f59e0b' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Madagascar 3: Europe's Mo...</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Die Another Day
movies.overview: Bond takes on a North Korean leader who undergoes DNA replacement procedures that allow him to assume different identities. American agent, Jinx Johnson assists Bond in his attempt to thwart the villain's plans to exploit a satellite that is powered by solar energy.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#f59e0b' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Die Another Day</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Ghostbusters
movies.overview: Following a ghost invasion of Manhattan, paranormal enthusiasts Erin Gilbert and Abby Yates, nuclear engineer Jillian Holtzmann, and subway worker Patty Tolan band together to stop the otherworldly threat.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#7c3aed' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Ghostbusters</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Armageddon
movies.overview: When an asteroid threatens to collide with Earth, NASA honcho Dan Truman determines the only way to stop it is to drill into its surface and detonate a nuclear bomb. This leads him to renowned driller Harry Stamper, who agrees to helm the dangerous space mission provided he can bring along his own hotshot crew. Among them is the cocksure A.J. who Harry thinks isn't good enough for his daughter, until the mission proves otherwise.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#06b6d4' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Armageddon</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Men in Black II
movies.overview: Kay and Jay reunite to provide our best, last and only line of defense against a sinister seductress who levels the toughest challenge yet to the MIB's untarnished mission statement – protecting Earth from the scum of the universe. It's been four years since the alien-seeking agents averted an intergalactic disaster of epic proportions. Now it's a race against the clock as Jay must convince Kay – who not only has absolutely no memory of his time spent with the MIB, but is also the only living person left with the expertise to save the galaxy – to reunite with the MIB before the earth submits to ultimate destruction.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#7c3aed' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Men in Black II</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Beowulf
movies.overview: 6th-century Scandinavian warrior, Beowulf embarks on a mission to slay the manlike ogre Grendel, a descendant of Cain.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#6366f1' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Beowulf</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
movies.overview: Continuing his "legendary adventures of awesomeness", Po must face two hugely epic, but different threats: one supernatural and the other a little closer to his home.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#7c3aed' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Kung Fu Panda 3</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
movies.overview: In the 4th installment of the Mission Impossible series, Ethan Hunt (Cruise) and his team are racing against time to track down a dangerous terrorist named Hendricks (Nyqvist), who has gained access to Russian nuclear launch codes and is planning a strike on the United States. An attempt to stop him ends in an explosion causing severe destruction to the Kremlin and the IMF to be implicated in the bombing, forcing the President to disavow them. No longer being aided by the government, Ethan and his team chase Hendricks around the globe, although they might still be too late to stop a disaster.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#ec4899' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Mission: Impossible - Ghost Pr...</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Rise of the Guardians
movies.overview: When an evil spirit known as Pitch lays down the gauntlet to take over the world, the immortal Guardians must join forces for the first time to protect the hopes, beliefs and imagination of children all over the world.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#ef4444' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Rise of the Guardians</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Fun with Dick and Jane
movies.overview: After Dick Harper loses his job at Globodyne in an Enron-esque collapse, he and his wife, Jane, turn to crime in order to handle the massive debt they now face. Two intelligent people, Dick and Jane actually get pretty good at robbing people and even enjoy it -- but they have second thoughts when they're reminded that crime can hurt innocent people. When the couple hears that Globodyne boss Jack McCallister actually swindled the company, they plot revenge.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#ec4899' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Fun with Dick and Jane</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: The Last Samurai
movies.overview: Nathan Algren is an American hired to instruct the Japanese army in the ways of modern warfare, which finds him learning to respect the samurai and the honorable principles that rule them. Pressed to destroy the samurai's way of life in the name of modernization and open trade, Algren decides to become an ultimate warrior himself and to fight for their right to exist.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#f59e0b' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>The Last Samurai</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Exodus: Gods and Kings
movies.overview: The defiant leader Moses rises up against the Egyptian Pharaoh Ramses, setting 400,000 slaves on a monumental journey of escape from Egypt and its terrifying cycle of deadly plagues.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#6366f1' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Exodus: Gods and Kings</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Star Trek
movies.overview: The fate of the galaxy rests in the hands of bitter rivals. One, James Kirk, is a delinquent, thrill-seeking Iowa farm boy. The other, Spock, a Vulcan, was raised in a logic-based society that rejects all emotion. As fiery instinct clashes with calm reason, their unlikely but powerful partnership is the only thing capable of leading their crew through unimaginable danger, boldly going where no one has gone before. The human adventure has begun again.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#7c3aed' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Star Trek</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Spider-Man
movies.overview: After being bitten by a genetically altered spider, nerdy high school student Peter Parker is endowed with amazing powers.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#10b981' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Spider-Man</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: How to Train Your Dragon 2
movies.overview: The thrilling second chapter of the epic How To Train Your Dragon trilogy brings back the fantastical world of Hiccup and Toothless five years later. While Astrid, Snotlout and the rest of the gang are challenging each other to dragon races (the island's new favorite contact sport), the now inseparable pair journey through the skies, charting unmapped territories and exploring new worlds. When one of their adventures leads to the discovery of a secret ice cave that is home to hundreds of new wild dragons and the mysterious Dragon Rider, the two friends find themselves at the center of a battle to protect the peace.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#06b6d4' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>How to Train Your Dragon 2</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Gods of Egypt
movies.overview: A common thief joins a mythical god on a quest through Egypt.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#ef4444' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Gods of Egypt</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Stealth
movies.overview: Deeply ensconced in a top-secret military program, three pilots struggle to bring an artificial intelligence program under control ... before it initiates the next world war.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#6366f1' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Stealth</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Watchmen
movies.overview: In a gritty and alternate 1985 the glory days of costumed vigilantes have been brought to a close by a government crackdown, but after one of the masked veterans is brutally murdered an investigation into the killer is initiated. The reunited heroes set out to prevent their own destruction, but in doing so uncover a sinister plot that puts all of humanity in grave danger.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#f59e0b' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Watchmen</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Lethal Weapon 4
movies.overview: In the combustible action franchise's final installment, maverick detectives Martin Riggs and Roger Murtaugh square off against Asian mobster Wah Sing Ku, who's up to his neck in slave trading and counterfeit currency. With help from gumshoe Leo Getz and smart-aleck rookie cop Lee Butters, Riggs and Murtaugh aim to take down Ku and his gang.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#06b6d4' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Lethal Weapon 4</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: Hulk
movies.overview: Bruce Banner, a genetics researcher with a tragic past, suffers massive radiation exposure in his laboratory that causes him to transform into a raging green monster when he gets angry.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#f59e0b' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>Hulk</text>        <text x='0' y='46' font-size='18' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.85)'>Movie</text>      </g>    </svg>

movies.title: G.I. Joe: Retaliation
movies.overview: Framed for crimes against the country, the G.I. Joe team is terminated by Presidential order. This forces the G.I. Joes into not only fighting their mortal enemy Cobra; they are forced to contend with threats from within the government that jeopardize their very existence.
movies.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='600' height='900' viewBox='0 0 600 900'>      <defs>        <linearGradient id='g' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1' y2='1'>          <stop offset='0' stop-color='#ef4444' stop-opacity='1'/>          <stop offset='1' stop-color='#020617' stop-opacity='0.18'/>        </linearGradient>      </defs>      <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#g)' rx='24'/>      <rect x='36' y='36' width='528' height='540' rx='12' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)' />      <g transform='translate(48,600)'>        <text x='0' y='0' font-size='36' font-family='system-ui,Segoe UI,Roboto,Arial' fill='white' font-weight='700'>G.I.
